title: The Idolm@ster Million Live! Million Comic Theater
alternative_title: みりおんコミックシアター
status: みりおんコミックシアター
description:
Description :
        Having started on March 26, 2014, it is a 5 cut manga released within the game. Usually, relates to gatchas or events going on at the time and does not have a regular update schedule.

The comics received a physical release with  THE IDOLM@STER MILLION LIVE! BACKSTAGE special edition, also drawn by mizuki.

Part of THE iDOLM@STER series.
